data.title: Chris Carrabba's Twin Forks To Headline Folsom Records Tour at House of Independents in Asbury
data.meta_description: The first Folsom Records Tour comes to Asbury Park and will feature Chris Carrabba's Twin Forks, Dan Layus of Augustana and more.
data.text:
The first ever Folsom Records Tour hits House of Independents in Asbury Park, New Jersey on Thursday April 20 at 7 p.m.

The tour will be headlined by Twin Forks, the Americana/rock outfit fronted by Chris Carrabba of Dashboard Confessional Fame.

Joining Twin Forks on the Folsom Records Tour will be Dan Layus of Augustana doing a solo act, and the Duluth, MN indie rock outfit, The Social Animals.

And if you didn’t guess it, the tour and label is named after Johnny Cash’s ubiquitous hit, “Folsom Prison Blues,” and the prison that inspired the tune.

Tickets go on sale tomorrow (Wednesday) at noon. Please use this link (and bookmark it) to get your tickets: http://bit.ly/2mYmDHJ

They are $17 in advance, $20 at the door. This is an all ages show, but you must be 21 to drink. House of Independents is located at 572 Cookman Avenue in Asbury Park. The box office number is: 732-977-5284.
